projects.title: Venvi
projects.desc: Utilized AWS S3, PassportJS, and Express to serve accounts & pictures for the MERN Car Reviews web app. Frontend design consisting of MaterialUI & AntDesign.

projects.title: Savant
projects.desc: Developed a livestream classroom interface using YoutubeAPI and Google Calendar to serve and save future videos or livestreams, AWS S3 and Firebase for profiles, MySQL to organize personalized favorites list.

projects.title: Plan-It
projects.desc: Ran AJAX calls on BART Trains, Weather, and Yelp API to display user search results, alongside Firebase Auth & RealtimeDB to store personalized notes.

projects.title: Galactic Guesser
projects.desc: Each planet contains a value, and you must match your score to the goal. The catch is, you must match it perfectly...if you go over, you lose! Built with JQuery, HTML, CSS.

projects.title: Google Books
projects.desc: Google Books is an easy to use React application where you can search for a book title, and save certain search results. > Built with ReactJS, NodeJS, & Google Books API V1.

projects.title: Word Guess Game
projects.desc: The goal of the game is to guess the correct letters to uncover the hidden word! There are 118 elements [as of May 2019] and the game will randomly choose one for the hidden word. Built with JS, HTML, CSS.
